alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:53AM CDT until further notice by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River at Merrill affecting Lincoln and Marathon Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River below Alexander Reservoir affecting Lincoln County. Wisconsin River below Wausau affecting Marathon County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Wisconsin River below Alexander Reservoir. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1259.0 feet, Widespread wooded lowland flooding downstream of the dam. The river current downstream of the dam in Council Grounds Park is fast. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:10 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 1259.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:10 AM CDT Thursday was 1259.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1259.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight.
